An extension that overhauls the New Tab page in your browser.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Changelog:

Update 1.0.0:
- Release!
- Basic searchbar

Update 1.0.1:
- Fixed some transition issues

Update 1.0.2:
- Fixed searchbar font
- Moved searchbar icon
- Repositioned the text and buttons
- Background is now radial rather than linear
- Removed "Search something up." text
- Date and time added

Update 1.0.3:
- Removed "New Tab" text and replaced with the icon
- Made some small changes to the styling

Update 1.0.31:
- Attempt to fix the issues with size and elements clipping on smaller devices
